Package tps.tp1.pack2Arrays

Class P02ArraysExtractUniqsAndReps

  • java.lang.Object
    • tps.tp1.pack2Arrays.P02ArraysExtractUniqsAndReps

  • public class P02ArraysExtractUniqsAndReps
extends java.lang.Object
    P02ArraysExtractUniqsAndReps encapsulates a program that starts by declaring two arrays (a and b) composed by ten integer numbers that are randomly selected from a uniform distribution within the following interval: [0, 20].

    Both arrays cannot have duplicate values within their structure. Thus, the program will continually generate random values until both arrays are composed by 10 distinct integers each.

    After generating both arrays the program performs the following operations:

    1. Displays the contents of both arrays to the console output.
    2. Creates and displays a new ordered array containing the elements that don't exist simultaneously in both arrays i.e. the following set: a ∪ (b/(a ∩ b));
    3. Creates and displays a new ordered array containing the elements that exist simultaneously in both arrays: (a ∩ b);

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pedro Fazenda
